attributes.action: Stop all Government Ministers being paid rediculous saleries and expences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's time to stop the ridiculous saleries being paid to our government employees and ministers including the Prime Minister. We are the ones who put them in their jobs, and we who work just as hard or even harder don't recieve these sort of salaries or expences. I say it's time a caped pay level was introduced.

rejection.details: The PM has already announced a freeze on all Ministers' salaries.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
